title: Marula fruit liqueur and coffee crème brûlées
description: Combine your coffee, dessert and booze courses in these magnificent crème brûlées made with a creamy liqueur distilled from Africa's wild marula fruit.For this recipe you will need 6 ramekins.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split lengthways, seeds scraped out
50ml/2fl oz marula fruit liqueur (look for Amarula)
25ml/1fl oz coffee liqueur, such as Tia Maria
